sqlMap.select: select * from analyzersuccessyear where aid=#aid# and year=#year#
select * from analyzersuccessyear where aid=#aid# and year=#year#
sqlMap.update:
update analyzersuccessyear
aname = #aname#
saname = #saname#
total = #total#
success = #success#
successratio = #successratio#
where aid=#aid# and year=#year#
sqlMap.delete: delete from analyzersuccessyear where aid=#aid# and year=#year#
sqlMap.select: select ays.*,a.agency as saname,a.industry as industry from analyzersuccessyear ays, analyzer a where ays.year=#year# and ays.aid=a.aid order by ays.successratio desc limit #start#,#length#

select ays.*,a.agency as saname,a.industry as industry from analyzersuccessyear ays, analyzer a where ays.year=#year# and ays.saname=#saname# and ays.aid=a.aid order by ays.successratio desc limit #start#,#length#
select year from analyzersuccessyear where aid=#value# order by year
